amo_description.message:
QR Lite generates and scans QR codes without relying on 3rd-party services.


=== Features ===

âœ… Generate QR codes for:
-  Active tab 
-  Links 
-  Selected text 
-  User input 

âœ… Scan QR code from:
-  Images 
-  Clipboard 
-  Any part of the web page 
-  Webcam 

âœ… Remember what you generated or scanned.
âœ… Everything works completely offline, nothing is sent over the network.


QR Lite is open-source software distributed under the MIT license.
If you enjoy this extension, please give us a 5-star review, thank you :)
